data.message:
My words for my Mentor,

He is standing in front of the stage
Stage fright is over, his hands are not sweaty
It feels good, it feels stronger, he gives, he takes
He gives all of himself and takes it draws ink from his words echoed
He listens with all that in him can hear, silence, absent
Empathetic, altruistic, tightrope walker, equilibrist, freediver, he plunges ever deeper depths.
Sadness without the clown, the furtive smile, no time to think too much. To do, undo and perfect
He thinks, he writes, he sings !!!
